name: Ostallian Fragments
description:
Imagine yourself in a spaceship, the Ostallian, drifting through space, emerged in a game you just can't pry your eyes off. It doesn't matter that you're slowly drifting towards a massive gravity singularity pulling you closer and closer. In fact, this is what's making your game so fascinating! The ship's alarms are howling but to you this is just the music to your game, soothing your mind as you are trying to figure out the best way to combine the colorful fragments. 

Features:

  • progressively more complex levels, randomized levels
  • Infinite mode
  • Who cares? Let me play..
